arts.ttl: Mainz cruise to comfortable victory over lacklustre Kiel
arts.sum: Mainz dominated Holstein Kiel in a 3-0 away victory on Matchday 11, with goals from Nadiem Amiri, Jonathan Burkardt, and Jae-Sung Lee. Paul Nebel pulled the strings from midfield in what was a record-breaking performance for Mainz in terms of their away form. Nadiem Amiri unleashes a powerful shot to open the scoring for Mainz early on in the 11th minute, setting the tone for their dominant performance against Kiel.

arts.ttl: Mainz easily dispatch harmless Kiel, move up to seventh place
arts.sum: Goals from Nadiem Amiri, Jonathan Burkardt, and Jae Sung Lee ensured that FSV Mainz 05 were easily able to dispatch Kiel in a match-day 11 Bundesliga fixture Sunday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Holstein Kiel vs. Mainz 05 preview: Can the visitors remain unbeaten on the road?
arts.sum: Mainz 05 will look to maintain their unbeaten away record when they travel to Holstein-Stadion for Sundayâ€™s Bundesliga contest.

arts.ttl: Preview: Holstein Kiel vs. Mainz 05 - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Holstein Kiel and Mainz 05, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Rapp declares Holtby fit enough to start against Mainz
arts.sum: Holstein Kiel head-coach Marcel Rapp revealed that squad captain Lewis Holtby, returning from injury, may be inserted into the starting XI against Mainz on Sunday.
